dct_title_s: Novus XVII inferioris Germaniae provinciarum typus
dct_description_sm: de integro multis in locis emendatus Ã  Guliel. Blaeu; Josua van den Ende sculp.
3 bar scales on map, given in "Milliaria Germanica communia," "Milliaria Belgica sive Horae itineris," and "Milliaria Gallica mediocria."
Decorative border and cartouches, elaborate compass rose, ships, sea creatures, sea monsters.
Population statistics and key in cartouche to left.
"Willem Blaeu opt Water inde vergulde Zonnewyser."
Dutch text on map, including scale statements.
Appears in Blaeu's Theatrum orbis terrarum, sive, atlas novus, Amsterdam, 1635, Latin edition.
